message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $9,500. I believe this offer reflects the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $8,500 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're willing to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8,750. Can you consider this compromise?
